tools.name: search
tools.description: Search the web for current, real-time information. Use this when you need: (1) Latest news or developments, (2) Current events, (3) Recent information beyond the knowledge cutoff, (4) Today's data or this week/month's updates. Examples: 'latest AI developments', 'current Bitcoin price', 'news today'.

num_results.description: Number of search results to retrieve (default: 5)
